scripts.assets: uglifyjs public/scripts/vendor/jquery.js public/scripts/vendor/bootstrap.js public/scripts/main.js -o public/scripts/worstcasestereo.min.js -c -m --source-map "root='http://worstcasestereo.com/public/scripts',url='worstcasestereo.min.js.map'" && uglifycss public/styles/vendor/bootstrap.css public/fontawesome/css/all.css public/styles/main.css public/styles/intro-slider.css public/styles/vendor/animate.min.css > public/styles/worstcasestereo.min.css
scripts.predeploy: uglifyjs public/scripts/vendor/jquery.js public/scripts/vendor/bootstrap.js public/scripts/main.js -o public/scripts/worstcasestereo.min.js -c -m --source-map "root='http://worstcasestereo.com/public/scripts',url='worstcasestereo.min.js.map'" && uglifycss public/styles/vendor/bootstrap.css public/fontawesome/css/all.css public/styles/main.css public/styles/intro-slider.css public/styles/vendor/animate.min.css > public/styles/worstcasestereo.min.css && npm run build
